TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsJitIntrinsic extends System.Object
public ref class IsJitIntrinsic abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示某一修饰的方法是一个内部值，实时 (JIT) 编译器可对它执行特殊代码生成。

span.span: Indicates that a modified method is an intrinsic value for which the just-in-time (JIT) compiler can perform special code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器在元数据中发出自定义修饰符，以更改当默认行为不合适时实时（JIT）编译器处理值的方式。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到自定义修饰符时，它将按修饰符指定的方式处理值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以对方法、参数和返回值应用自定义修饰符。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以使用以下方法之一将自定义修饰符发送到元数据中：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用 类中的方法，如 、、和 。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令文件，其中包含对的调用 `modopt` 和 `modreq`，并使用[Ilasm （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)汇编文件。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
